casebody.data:
Cleveland Bar Association v. Willis.

[Cite as Cleveland Bar Assn. v. Willis (1993), 67 Ohio St.3d 73.]

*74(No. 93-870 Submitted June 15, 1993 Decided August 11, 1993.) *75McDonald, Hopkins, Burke & Haber Co., L.P.A., and John T. Mulligan; Kaufman & Cumberland Co., L.P.A., and Gail E. Sindell; and James B. Davis, for relator. Per Curiam.

We agree that respondent committed the disciplinary violations found by the board. We also agree with the board’s recommendation. Accordingly, respondent is hereby suspended indefinitely from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
